review: Had it from the 1st day. Thx for scamming with OV2
I don't think this game will change to better even after desperate looking for players on steam

Imagine Overwatch 1 but worse. That's Overwatch 2. I would go into more details why, but I honestly can not articulate the words necessary to effectively point to why this game is S tier trash.

This video by nerdSlayer Studios pretty much explains my thoughts and goes into greater detail on why this game is... the way it is...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nyEq-oDeLI


A better game is: https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/
Tis fun, anyone who disagrees is just trash at the game imo.

Pese a las pol√©micas y la falta de contenido, Overwatch siempre ha tenido un lugar de entre mis juegos favoritos. Revisando meramente los modos existentes y el contenido en turno en este nuevo port a Steam, realmente no hay una gran diferencia con el a√±o anterior. Es divertido echar unas partidas r√°pidas y tener enfrentamientos intensos que pueden prolongarse porque alguien del equipo enemigo no se despega del payload. Ojal√° el equipo encargado de Overwatch comience a tomar mejores decisiones con este gran juego.

[h1] You shouldn't play Overwatch 2 [/h1]

Overwatch 2 is like a 1.1 patch, but they removed content and delayed content. After six seasons they implement the PvE content that was the main content in the past with which they made commercial videos. They were lying and screwed the community. For sure you have to pay extra for these features.
But now PvP and the new battle pass system are the main focus. 
For PvP it is debatable if there were good changes or not, but overall many people are complaining about the competitive modes, because you cannot really climb in ranks and eSport was using the same heroes for there matches is saying everything. But Overwatch already didn't get any updates since the hero "Echo" in April 2020. If they would have put more afford into the game they could have continue with updating the game with balance patches, new maps and new heroes like they did with "OW2".
But instead the new game removed all good content.

[u] The biggest problem: money grabbing and unfair reward system. [/u]
Monetarization is a completely scam, you cannot get any good skins during grinding, because it takes more than a half year to play consistently. They fake discounts and use all - sadly - modern standards of grabbing money. The battle pass is a complete disaster. The prices are highly unfair and even old Overwatch 1 skins getting selled for ridiculous amounts.

But people are still paying money, [b] poor state of gaming [/b] to support battle passes.

For more detailed, organized and explained informations watch these recommended YouTube videos:

"The State of Overwatch 2" by A_Seagull.

"Overwatch 2 is free but I still feel scammed" by zanny.

"Overwatch 2 is a New Low in Gaming" by doob.

"Overwatch 2 is Unacceptable Garbage" by TheWhat Show.

"Overwatch 2: The Laziest Sequel" by The Act Man.

Luego de 700hs en el launcher de Blizzard, y con la compra de todos los pases de batallas, sin mencionar que tengo casi 2000 horas en TF2, creo que se merece una rese√±a este juego por mi parte. Primer punto, es el mismo juego que el primero, pero con m√°s mejoras, y te lo dice alguien que nunca jug√≥ el 1, pero lo consum√≠ bastante en v√≠deos y streams. Segundo punto, el juego es bastante divertido en su modo competitivo (llegu√© a m√°ster en DPS y SUPP y diamante alto en Tanke). El tercer punto, que es lo negativo, es la estafa que result√≥ el supuesto nuevo modo PVE (que fue cancelado) y el cooperativo con amigos prometido, todo eso brilla con su ausencia, el nuevo modo "Invasi√≥n", aunque no lo he jugado, puedo afirmar sin equivocarme que no vale la pena, primero porque se van a olvidar de √©l cuando pasen las semanas y no vas a encontrar partida, segundo porque se va a volver repetitivo a las pocas horas de jugarlo, y tercero porque no hay verdadera motivaci√≥n para seguir jugando luego de obtener las recompensas. Todo esto es mi humilde opini√≥n, a√∫n as√≠, lo recomiendo.

Its a bad sequel that scraped most of the pve content, doesn't respect free to plays, straight up charge you $20 for a skin, and are greedy for money. If only they didn't scrap what they promised then it would've been a reason for the 2 to exist, because its just Overwatch 1.5

Overwatch 2 is a shell of it used to be. It has no respect for you, your time and money. It made players miss loot boxes of things , it canceled what the original PVE was supposed to be and what didn't canceled it has the audacity to sell to you. Is a very greedy game, with poor balancing,bugs and toxic community. Until the Microsoft- Activision-Blizzard deal is done( and maybe a while longer since all the talent left Blizzard) I have no interest in a game that doesn't respect me. Go play Team Fortress 2 or Deep Rock Galactic. I just grabbed my achivements and left. Shame. I used to be a Blizzard fan but no one is more than your own

Here, a list of everything Team Fortress 2 , thats killing OW2..

FIRST OF ALL : - TF2 outlived Overwatch, Twice. Without any major update or new weapons in 6 years... (Chad)
- TF1 turned into TF2, but it was a different game, New maps, graphics, heroes, stuff etc.. not just added a number for fun. (Ouch.)
- TF2 is better to play, and community is awesome.
- TF2 Sentry isnt broken, and aim better.
- TF2 Had multiple guns you can use between other Mercenaries.
- TF2 has a unlimited access of build & equipement, that you dont have to pay for (Like OW2 pay the champ or tryhard..)
- TF2 have MvMachines ticket tour. You can win a lot of money and sexy weapons with this.
- TF2 was on steam before.
- TF2 Crates can be openned with key for 2.20$ , cost less than those 20$ for a single skin in OW2.
- Crate can also drop content that cost a lot of money (Unusuals)
- TF2 have a lot of community maps.
- TF2 have community servers.
- TF2 Give you items for free , for achievement or just playing.
- TF2 Dont need new heroes, cause weapon build is fire.
- TF2 Player sometimes roleplay as their role characters. Funny asf.
- TF2 has ROCKETJUMP.
